rukus.text: Hai ureueng mukmin ‘oh taseumbahyang Phon-phon beu rijang mukateuh tarhah Tarhah lom jaroe beu troh bak singkee Tasampoh ulee teuma beu basah Tarhah lom gaki beu troh bak gatok Ban peut nyan tacok han jeut takeubah Meunyo meujunub beudoh jak manoe Meu saket teuh nyoe jeut laen ulah Atawa gata teungoh musaphee U kakoh lagi teuma talangkah Atawa teupeh ngon ureueng inong Teuma ie pih tan hana meurimbah Ka leuh tamita teuma hana ie Nyan jeut hana peue tatayammom bagah Dhoi tanoh nyang got tasampoh muka Ngon jaro gata pih bandua blah Hana meunapsu Allah Taʻala Meularat gata na jeut keu susah Tapi meunapsu mangat gleh gata Lom seumpurna nikmat bak Allah Nikmat keu gata mangat tachuko

Sabe bek teuwo keu nikmat Allah Taingat nikmat Neubri keu gata Janji ngon gata masa nyang sudah Watee nyan takheun kamoe deungo that Lom kamoe taʻat turot peurintah Teuma takwa gata keu Tuhan ‘Eleumee Tuhan leupah that luah Peue nyang lam dada bandum Neuteupue Hana meusapeue pih na meuilah

Hai ureueng mukmin beu teutap ate Tapubuet sabe kareuna Allah Tadong keu saksi gata beu ade Bek jeut keu pake dum hamba Allah Bek sabab beunci gata keu kawom Watee tahukom ka roh meusalah Ka hana ade hukom di gata Tahukom teuma beu ade leupah Meu gata ade toe ngon takwa Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Tuhan Neuma‘lum peue nyang tapubuet Hana meubacut pih na meuilah s
Tuhan Neujanji keu ureueng mukmin Amai ureueng nyan pih jroh sileupah Neubri amponan Allah Taʻala s Neubri lom pahla raya that leupah
Teuma si kaphe nyang han tem pateh Ayat dum meuceh jipeugah salah Jipeugah sulet dum ayat Kamoe Bandum jih asoe nuraka juah

Hai ureueng mukmin beu na taingat Keu gata nikmat Neubri le Allah Watee kawom nyan ka jitang jaroe Gata jikiloe jimeupoh beukah Teuma jaroe jih Neumat le Tuhan Han ek jipadan gata jikeubah Teuma takwa gata keu Tuhan Ureueng meuiman jok droe bak Allah
